Michaelmas Term*: The Prayer Book

Tuesday 28 September (August 9)* 2004: Daily Office & Eucharist

Tuesday 5 October(August 16)* 2004: Occasional Services

Tuesday 12 October(August 23)* 2004: Rubrics and Catechism

Tuesday 19 October(August 30)* 2004: Personal and Family Prayer

Tuesday 26 September(September 6)* 2004: 39 Articles and Historic Prefaces

*Because we will be rehearsing Nutcracker during the All Saints term, we will be doing that term in Michaelmas timeframe instead, and starting this term at Lammas.
